name: Grandview Gardens Bed & Breakfast

reviews.text: What a great little spot...completely clean, beautifuly appointed and friendly innkeepers. I'd stay back here anytime I am in town, it's a terrific value. It's also walkable to the shopping, restaurants, etc. of CityWalk, which we took advantage of several times.
reviews.title: amazing place

reviews.text: What a find. A delightful B&B tucked away in the historic part of WPB very close to City Place with its many resturants and shops.
reviews.title: Simply the best....
Outstanding B & B
reviews.text: We stayed in room 5 Allamanda which overlooked a beautifully tended courtyard and gardens with its own swimming pool. The room was impeccably clean, spacious and comfortable with a sumptious bed. Baby soft towels & robes awaited in the bathroom.

reviews.title: Perfect B&B in West Palm
reviews.text: Rick and Peter are attentive hosts and serve a healthy breakfast by the pool. Nothing was too much trouble for them. Peter even converted me to Camomile Tea!!!

reviews.title: Attention to Detail
reviews.text: The problem with running many a small b&b is that you get into a routine and benign neglect sets in: With Grandview Gardens, this is NOT at all the case. The owners, Peter and Rick, are continuously on their toes to make sure every room is stylish to the last detail, to make sure the breakfast wishes of every guest are fulfilled, to make sure the garden and pool are always in perfect shape.

reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
reviews.text: A wonderful place to stay and relax, while being close to the key facilities of West Palm Beach and close to Palm Beach beaches. I must return soon!!

aka: Grandview Gardens Hotel West Palm Beach
description: In the heart of West Palm Beach, Florida, Grandview Gardens Bed & Breakfast and Vacation Cottages is located in the Grandview Heights Historic Neighborhood. City Place, the rejuvenated city center with its restaurants, theaters, cafes, nightclubs and boutiques, is 15 minutes walking distance. The beaches are 5 minutes away by car and 15 minutes by bicycle (which we provide complimentary). The Palm Beach Convention Center, Norton Museum of Art, Antique Row, Kravis Center for the Performing Arts and the famous resort island of Palm Beach with its beautiful beaches are 5 minutes away.
